participant_1.name: Mason Hart
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, with a passion for music and storytelling.
participant_1.background: i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry. we spent summers singing at national parks. i'm a country music singer.

participant_2.name: Ella Thompson
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, with a strong sense of community and love for animals.
participant_2.background: i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue.
